episodes.title: Episode 22: We Don't Know That For Certain

We don't know why Chewie doesn't cry, or if Bobby is a rainbow rider, or if Steven Avery did it. We don't know why Bobby isn't verified, why he is seduced by the dark side, or why he is beloved amongst Mexican inmates.

We don't know shit. We never have. We don't know what the next year holds but we hope it's a beautiful one for all of you.

Happy New Year, babybellies!
